Text: You may find a Java error when starting the 1.1 AdventureCraft. To fix this go to http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-3.7.1-201109091335/index.php#SWT and get the x86/64 Windows download. Extract the files and replace the SWT file in the directory. Hope this helps.

Also regarding AdventureCraft,  if you don't have a Minecraft install in your AppData/Roaming folder, copy the 1.1 vanilla .minecraft folder there, as the install needs to pick up those files. Then you can play portable after it all installs correctly. There are quite a few maps available for AC on the wiki too.
you should put the tekkit mod in here as well
